objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A1A1A'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#2A2A2A'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='bg2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#3A3A3A'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#4A4A4A'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg1)'/><path d='M1080 0 L450 0 L1080 650 Z' fill='#303030'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080 L1080 1080 Z' fill='url(#bg2)'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='220' cy='220' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='240' cy='240' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='180' cy='220' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='220' cy='180' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='920' cy='920' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='940' cy='940' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='880' cy='920' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/><circle cx='920' cy='880' r='5' fill='#FFFFFF'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M100 150 L150 100 L130 170 Z' fill='#CDCDCD'/><path d='M980 800 L930 850 L950 780 Z' fill='#CDCDCD'/></g><rect x='40' y='40' width='300' height='2' fill='#757575'/><rect x='40' y='42' width='2' height='300' fill='#757575'/><rect x='1040' y='1040' width='-300' height='-2' fill='#757575'/><rect x='1040' y='1038' width='-2' height='-300' fill='#757575'/></svg>

objects.text:
• 2-piece set with utensil & silverware holders
• Sleek matte black with decorative cutouts
• Durable metal with rust-resistant coating
• Stylish wooden handle accents included

product_details.name: Premium Kitchen Utensil Organizer Set - Modern Black Collection
product_details.description:
• Sleek matte black design with decorative utensil cutouts and perforated pattern
• 2-piece set includes large utensil holder and matching silverware caddy
• Durable metal construction with rust-resistant coating
• Perfect height for storing cooking tools and eating utensils
• Stylish wooden handle accents on utensils for enhanced durability
• Space-saving circular design fits perfectly on countertops
• Easy to clean and dishwasher safe
• Versatile storage solution for kitchen tools and flatware
• Modern minimalist aesthetic complements any kitchen décor
• Ergonomically designed for easy access to all utensils

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek, modern kitchen-themed design with a strong emphasis on bold text and contrast. The background is composed of layered diagonal gradients and geometric elements, creating visual depth using shades of gray and charcoal. A prominent product image on the right shows stylish black utensil holders with kitchen tools.

Text elements include a large, bold **title** (`heading`) and **subheading** (`subheading`) aligned top-left, followed by a rectangular **decorative line** (`decorative_line`). Below it is a multi-line **description** (`description`) listing key product features. A bold **price tag** (`price`) is featured mid-left with a distinct **CTA button** (`cta_background` and `cta`) below it encouraging user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Gray: `#1A1A1A`
- Slate Gray: `#2A2A2A`
- Warm Gray: `#4A4A4A`
- Light Gray Text: `#B0B0B0`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Button Background: `#E0E0E0`
- Button Text: `#1A1A1A`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern kitchen utensil set dominated by deep charcoal gray and matte black tones. The utensils feature a smooth gradient from dark slate blue (#303841) at the tips to natural bamboo wood (#D6A96C) handles, creating a balanced contrast. The containers are matte black (#1C1C1C) with metallic stainless steel (#B0B0B0) cutlery accentuating a subtle shine. The cut-out utensils design on the tall container also reveals the natural wood texture. These colors blend seamlessly, offering a blend of sophistication and functionality, making them ideal for banners targeting modern kitchen aesthetics. Suggested color palette is elegant and muted.
